description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Bathurst, Australia. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Contemporary Bathurst Retreat on Famous Mount Panorama Racetrack
hotels.description: Make all your racing dreams come true at the chic Rydges Mount Panorama Bathurst, perfectly positioned on the famous Mount Panorama racetrack and only minutes from the vibrant Bathurst CBD. Wake up to unparalleled panoramic vistas of Conrod Straight and the local countryside, savour modern Australian dishes made with the freshest regional produce at the hotel's Chicane Bar & Grill, before heading out to explore the town's heritage-listed buildings and rich gold mine history.

seo.title: Hotel a Bathurst - Australia Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Trova i migliori hotel a Bathurst, Australia con offerte esclusive. Prenota la tua fuga perfetta con fino al 60% di sconto.
